languages.text: Лишившись семьи, Абеляр Версериан продолжил службу у Вольного Торговца. Ожесточившийся сенешаль установил тиранические порядки на палубах и спустя несколько лет погиб от рук восставших членов экипажа, не желающих более терпеть драконовских указов и наказаний.

After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.
languages.original_text: Лишившись семьи, Абеляр Версериан продолжил службу у Вольного Торговца. Ожесточившийся сенешаль установил тиранические порядки на палубах и спустя несколько лет погиб от рук восставших членов экипажа, не желающих более терпеть драконовских указов и наказаний.

traits.locale_text: After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. Bitter Seneschal established tyrannical rules on the decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of revolting crewmen, who were sick with draconian decrees and punishments.

After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. Bitter Seneschal established tyrannical rules on the decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of revolting crewmen, who were sick with draconian decrees and punishments.

After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

languages.text: 失去了所有家人之后，阿贝拉德·韦尔森继续在行商浪人手下工作。他满怀怨恨与痛苦，在甲板上建立起了专制的统治。几年后，由于他的严酷法令与惩罚，船员爆发了叛乱，而他也在这场叛乱中身亡。
languages.original_text: After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

traits.locale_text: 失去了所有家人之后，阿贝拉德·韦尔森继续在行商浪人手下工作。他满怀怨恨与痛苦，在甲板上建立起了专制的统治。几年后，由于他的严酷法令与惩罚，船员爆发了叛乱，而他也在这场叛乱中身亡。

languages.text: Nachdem er seine Familie verloren hatte, verrichtete Abelard Werserian weiterhin seinen Dienst unter {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Der verbitterte Truchsess führte auf seinen Decks tyrannische Regeln ein. Mehrere Jahre später starb er durch die Hände von Crewmitgliedern, die gegen seine drakonischen Erlässe und Strafen revoltierten.
languages.original_text: After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er seine Familie verloren hatte, verrichtete Abelard Werserian weiterhin seinen Dienst unter {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Der verbitterte Truchsess führte auf seinen Decks tyrannische Regeln ein. Mehrere Jahre später starb er durch die Hände von Crewmitgliedern, die gegen seine drakonischen Erlässe und Strafen revoltierten.

languages.text: Après avoir perdu sa famille, Abélard Werserian continua à servir fidèlement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, mais il était tellement rongé par l'amertume qu'il imposa son règne tyrannique sur les ponts dont il avait la charge. Le sénéchal fut tué plusieurs années plus tard par des membres d'équipage révoltés par ses punitions incessantes et ses décrets draconiens.
languages.original_text: After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir perdu sa famille, Abélard Werserian continua à servir fidèlement {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, mais il était tellement rongé par l'amertume qu'il imposa son règne tyrannique sur les ponts dont il avait la charge. Le sénéchal fut tué plusieurs années plus tard par des membres d'équipage révoltés par ses punitions incessantes et ses décrets draconiens.

languages.text: Después de perder a su familia, Abelard Werserian continuó su servicio bajo el mando de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El Senescal amargado estableció un control tiránico sobre sus cubiertas. Años más tarde, murió a manos de una tripulación amotinada contra sus decretos y castigos draconianos.
languages.original_text: After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

traits.locale_text: Después de perder a su familia, Abelard Werserian continuó su servicio bajo el mando de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El Senescal amargado estableció un control tiránico sobre sus cubiertas. Años más tarde, murió a manos de una tripulación amotinada contra sus decretos y castigos draconianos.

languages.text: 家族を失ってからも、アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは自由開拓者のもとで務めを果たし続けた。恨みを募らせた家令長は、圧制によって船団を支配する。数年後、厳格な命令と懲罰に反旗を翻したクルーの手によって、アベラルドは命を落としたのだった。
languages.original_text: After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

traits.locale_text: 家族を失ってからも、アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは自由開拓者のもとで務めを果たし続けた。恨みを募らせた家令長は、圧制によって船団を支配する。数年後、厳格な命令と懲罰に反旗を翻したクルーの手によって、アベラルドは命を落としたのだった。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian, ailesini kaybettikten sonra Hür Tacir'in hizmetinde çalışmayı sürdürdü. Giderek hırçınlaşan Seneşal, güvertelerini bir tiran gibi yönetti. Birkaç yıl sonra gaddarca hükümlerine ve cezalarına karşı ayaklanan mürettebatın elinde can verdi.
languages.original_text: After losing his family, Abelard Werserian continued his service under the Rogue Trader. The embittered Seneschal established tyrannical rule on his decks. Several years later, he died at the hands of crewmen revolting against his draconian decrees and punishments.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian ailesini kaybettikten sonra Hür Tacir'in hizmetinde çalışmayı sürdürdü. Giderek hırçınlaşan Seneşal, güvertelerini bir tiran gibi yönetti. Birkaç yıl sonra gaddarca hükümlerine ve cezalarına karşı ayaklanan mürettebatın elinde can verdi.
